data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Çekme Ekranı Unmanaged'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_PO_CLEA_UM 
    as select from  znft_t_dlv_cus                 as shipment_hd
    inner join      znft_t_dlvit_cus               as shipment on shipment.deliverydocument = shipment_hd.deliverydocument

    inner join      ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_PO_LIST_BASE as Base     on  Base.PurchaseOrder     = shipment.purchaseorder
                                                               and Base.PurchaseOrderItem = shipment.purchaseorderitem
    left outer join ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_CLEA_QTY     as clea_qty on  clea_qty.referencedocument     = shipment.deliverydocument
                                                               and clea_qty.referencedocumentitem = shipment.deliverydocumentitem
    left outer join znft_t_clea_cus                as clea_cus on  clea_cus.deliverydocument     = shipment.deliverydocument
                                                               and clea_cus.deliverydocumentitem = shipment.deliverydocumentitem
  association to parent ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_CLEARENCE_UM as _Clearence on $projection.CompanyCode = _Clearence.CompanyCode
{
  key Base.CompanyCode,
  key shipment.deliverydocument,
  key shipment.deliverydocumentitem,
      Base.PurchaseOrder,
      Base.PurchaseOrderItem,
      Base.PurchaseOrderType,
      Base.IncotermsClassification,
      Base.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      Base.PaymentTerms,
      Base.loekz,
      Base.IsCompletelyDelivered,
      Base.IsStatisticalItem,
      Base.PurchasingOrganization,
      Base.PurchasingGroup,
      Base.PurchaseOrderDate,
      Base.Supplier,
      Base.CreatedByUser,
      Base.erdat,
      Base.Plant,
      Base.StorageLocation,
      Base.attyp,
      Base.ManufacturerMaterial,
      Base.MaterialGroup,
      Base.MaterialGroupText,
      Base.mtart,
      Base.SupplierMaterialNumber,
      Base.Material,
      Base.MaterialText,
      Base.Batch,
      Base.ScheduleLineDeliveryDate,
      Base.AccountAssignmentCategory,
      Base.ConsumptionPosting,
      Base.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyDnmntr,
      Base.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyNmrtr,
      Base.SupplierConfirmationControlKey,
      Base.InvoiceIsGoodsReceiptBased,
      Base.GoodsReceiptIsExpected,
      Base.OverdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      Base.UnderdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      Base.UnlimitedOverdeliveryIsAllowed,
      Base.StockType,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      Base.OrderQuantity,
      Base.PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit,
      Base.mara_meins,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.NetPriceAmount,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'OrderPriceUnit'
      Base.NetPriceQuantity,
      Base.OrderPriceUnit,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.NetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.GrossAmount,
      Base.DocumentCurrency,
      Base.SalesOrder,
      Base.SalesOrderItem,
      Base.WBSElementInternalID_2,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      shipment.shipquantity,
      shipment.referencedocument,
      shipment.referencedocumentitem,
      shipment.incentivedocument,
      shipment.incentivedocumentitem,
      shipment.controldocument,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      //      case when clea_qty.quantity > 0  then ( shipment.shipquantity - clea_qty.quantity ) else shipment.shipquantity end as clearencequantity,
      case when clea_qty.quantity > 0  then ( shipment.shipquantity - clea_qty.quantity )
                                       else shipment.shipquantity end as clearencequantity_max,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      clea_cus.clearencequantity,
      //      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'currency'
      //      shipment.netpr,
      //      shipment.peinh,
      //      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'currency'
      //      shipment.netwr,
      //      shipment.currency,
      shipment.invoicedocument,
      shipment.invoicedate,
      shipment.gtipno,
      shipment.origin,
      //      Base._ClearenceCustomFields,
      _Clearence
}
where
  shipment_hd.documenttype = '1'
